vWashington House Rabbit Newsv

Volume 7  Issue 1 March 1998

Thank You So Very Much!!

The House Rabbit Society is a non-profit organization that relies on your generous dollars to rescue, care for, and find loving homes for foster house rabbits. Thank you for helping:

Alan Rubenstein..........................$250.00

The House Rabbit Society sends a BIG THANK YOU to all who stop by the HRS Adoption Center at the Best Little Rabbit Rodent and Ferret House, bearing gifts of fresh veggies for the foster bunnies. We truly appreciate your great kindness which is of tremendous help to us. A special thank you goes to Wendy Heath and Brian Hardy, Patti Polinsky and Dave Claar, and a very special thank you to

CHRIS CASE

for donating over $400 in cases of veggies throughout the year.

THANK YOU ALL!
